sentence.Network_en: He found himself content to watch idly the sluggish flow of the turbid stream.
sentence.Network_cn: 他心安理得地懒洋洋地望着混浊的河水缓缓流着.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the figurative sense): from Latin turbidus, from turba 'a crowd, a disturbance'

means.word_mean: 1. (of especially liquids) clouded as with sediment;

auth_sentence.content: The turbid utterances and twisted language of Carlyle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The turbid utterances and twisted language of Carlyle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The turbid utterances and twisted language of Carlyle.

auth_sentence.content: He was never tempted by the lure of collectivism, which he dismissed as "the turbid rubbish of the Red bookshop".
auth_sentence.res_content: He was never tempted by the lure of collectivism, which he dismissed as "the turbid rubbish of the Red bookshop".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was never tempted by the lure of collectivism, which he dismissed as "the turbid rubbish of the Red bookshop".

auth_sentence.content: His well is running red and turbid and bubbles with so much gas that he fears he'll lose that agricultural certification.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His well is running red and turbid and bubbles with so much gas that he fears he'll lose that agricultural certification.

stems_affixes.word_buile: turb搅动,混乱+id表形容词→搅动的→混浊的
turb搅动,混乱+ulent多……的→adj.狂暴的,无秩序的
im不+perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+able……的→不受扰乱[影响]
disturb[v.扰乱,妨碍,使不安]+ance表名词→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+ation表名词→n.动摇, 混乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 骚动;强烈而不稳定的气流/水流

stems_affixes.word_buile: turb搅动,混乱+ine物,机器等→n.汽轮机,涡轮机
tur=turb搅动,混乱+moil翻腾→搅动,翻腾→混乱
dis分开+turb搅动,混乱→搅开了→搅乱了
